objects.text: • USB CHARGING • 8 SMOOTH WHEELS • LAPTOP POCKET

product_details.description: Accessibility just made a move to the next level. No cap. Our classic Cabin Luggage has now evolved! The Cabin Pro is designed for quick access to help you breeze through security. UNDESTRUCTABLE GERMAN MARKLON POLYCARBONATE SHELL: Casing: Hard LIGHTWEIGHT & INDUSTRY BEST STORAGE: Capacity: 40liter, Weight: 3.65 grams, Dimension : 57.8 x 37 x 24.3 cm SILENT RUN JAPANESE WHEEL TECHNOLOGY: Number of wheels: 8, Super Smooth Hinomoto Wheels THE MOST FEATURE RICH LUGGAGE: USB Port: 1, Powerbank not included, Lock Type: TSA Number Lock, Comes with magic eraser, Dust Bag & Laundry Bag Water resistant: Yes Outer material - Polycarbonate ** Water resistance level - Water Resistant ** Country of Origin - India **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern and premium luggage advertisement using a sleek, dark-themed layout. The background features geometric accents with gradients and subtle golden highlights, establishing a luxurious tone. A central circular outline frames the featured product image (`product_image`), a smart suitcase with functional detailing aligned perfectly to draw attention.

The heading (`heading`) and subheading (`subheading`) are stacked with bold, eye-catching fonts, with the title in a vibrant gold hue and the subtitle in clean white, ensuring clarity. Pricing information (`price`) sits inside a bright yellow circular bubble to the side, contrasted by dark text.

Feature highlights are presented in a horizontal white text bar (`description`) near the bottom, citing core technical benefits. A strong call-to-action (`cta_background` and `cta`) appears in a yellow button format centered at the base.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Teal (#1E3B3A)
- Golden Yellow (#FFD700)
- Deep Gold (#D4AF37)
- Rich Green (#1A2E26)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern suitcase with a dominant deep olive green exterior (hex: #4A5A47), which exudes sophistication and durability. Accentuated with vibrant mustard yellow detailing (hex: #F4B400), the contrast draws attention to interior compartments and zippers, highlighting functionality with flair. The black handle and wheels (hex: #1C1C1C) ground the design, enhancing its robust feel. The interior yellow grid pattern (hex: #FFD54F) adds brightness and visual interest inside. These complementary tones blend harmoniously while maintaining strong contrast, making them ideal for an ad banner that balances elegance with modern, adventure-ready appeal.
